author: rdonkin
msg: Added section detailing the location of the Apache archives. Suggested by William A. Rowe, Jr. on the general mailing list.

author: rgoers
msg: Created XPathXMLFileModule to fix problems with XMLFileModule. Added getAttributeValue to JXPathHelper and changed all references to getAttribute to use it instead. Moved registration of VariableResolver to BridgeElementParser from SitemapElementParser to make it available to all Avalon components (i.e. input modules).
